name: Tank Battle Army Commando: Hero Blitz at World War
name_original: Tank Battle Army Commando: Hero Blitz at World War
description:
Join the Army Tank Battle as Brave WW2 Commander & Destroy the Enemy Base!
Get ready for the super tank battles at deserted warfield. Download Tank Battle Army Commando WW2; Take yourself to the real world war ii. Enemies have caused havoc to your country and as a military commander it is your sole duty to destroy them.

Driving vehicle into the warfield; head straight for the tank blitz. There is much havoc and destruction. Inspired from your battle skills; military heads have sent you to enemies base camp for a real tank battle. At Army Tank Battle Commander WW2; Destroy jeeps and trucks you encounter in the field. Fire rockets and missiles at the enemy airplane. Disarm nuclear warhead and shot missiles at airliner parked in the enemy hanger. You are on a mission to destroy all armed vehicle. So take hold of army tank as a trained military commander and destroy rivals.

Tank Battle Army Commando WW2 Features:

Real deserted War field environment
Multiple Tanks available for selection at hangar
Challenging Tank blitz Missions
Realistic Explosive Sounds
Smooth & Realistic Driving Controls
